commit message: remove focus when user scrolls. This makes the editor easier to navigate, and you don't get the annoying image popup if you happened to stop scrolling near an image.
Restore query strings for reader stats, these didn't make it in the merge from v1.5
added resource folders to support the nook tablet, which incorrectly identifies itself as xlarge :/
Fixes #245, gets post formats in account setup.
Only add post formats if there's more than 0 returned.
Set the correct app title and the correct 'post signature' on the PlayBook. Ref #269.

Changed build to use Android 3.2, so that we can use layout-sw720p for layouts on larger tablets.

Added new LocationHelper class and location capability checks to fix #272.

Added null check for Post object to fix #273. (source of post object being null there is still under investigation)
Fix oom issues when converting image for upload. Show image upload error message after post upload if something went wrong.
Fixes #268 by not breaking out of the loop when a match is found. This will use the last match found in the response.
Fixes #118
get rid of image tags if the media upload fails.
Fixes #267.
Shouldn't reference titleBar, here as it is NULL.
Updated version number.
added escaping to url in Read.java, solves issue when wp-admin wouldn't load if you had a '%' character in your password.
Don't rest post content in onCreate(), should fix issues some users are seeing with content not being returned from the EditContent activity.
Some tweaks to the HTML editor.
make sure to run title bar updates on ui thread.
Clean up some UI thread issues related to Fragments
Fixed uithread issue.
Was getting some serious f/c issues when calling getPostFormats from the account setup. Removed it and will just refresh post formats on load of dashboard.
import cleanup
Migrated code from EditContent.java to EditPost.java. Removing EditContent activity entirely due to memory issues on older devices.
Removing EditContent.java.
Handle cancel action from quick photo/video.
Fix for #276, and a few editor fixes.
Added a list of missing HW/SW features on PlayBook devices.
post editor updates.
no minLines needed any longer
Modified the function that detects the BB runtime.
Load the media library if the device doesn't have a camera. (for kindle fire, nook tablet, etc)
